metadata.synopsis: Shadow the displacer beast is one of the animals who will participate in the doppelganger-dribbles attack. Player can try (and fail) to calm her, and realise the only way to stop her is to break the cage lock and trap her.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load act 3. Teleport to the circus. Shadow and Crimson are currently by Dribbles and in seperate cages. Feed Crimson and trap Shadow before triggering the fight in order for them to survive and have subsequent dialogues after the fight.

22.speaker: Shadow-Whiskers
22.text: My kills. My prey. You took them. Run. I'll find you. Eat you. COWARD.

34.speaker: Narrator
34.text: *Teeth bared, she promises claws in your gut, and fangs on your throat.*

43.speaker: Shadow-Whiskers
43.text: I thought you a hunter. Wrong. You're prey - small. Snivelling. Pathetic.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: Check if the cage's lock is secure.

23.speaker: Narrator
23.text: *While the cage is sturdy, the lock is old. It could be jammed shut - so not even a key could open it.*
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player inspect the cage. Reusing animation.

45.speaker: Narrator
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player inspect the cage. Reusing animation.

39.speaker: Shadow-Whiskers
39.text: My time comes. I will show you. All of you.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Show me what? Come on - your secret is safe with me.

32.speaker: Shadow-Whiskers
32.text: Mock me. Tease me. You will be the first.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: First in what? Come on - your secret is safe with me.

3.speaker: Shadow-Whiskers
3.text: Look. See. The crowd - they laugh. They shine with innocence. But it is a lie.

64.speaker: Shadow-Whiskers
64.text: Every one of you is vicious. Cruel. You kill my mate. Steal my cubs.

44.speaker: Halsin
44.text: Poor creature - locked in a cage, denied her true nature. Civilisation would call her a monstrosity, yet it treats her like this...?
44.context: NodeContext: Saddened/outraged at a caged creature's plight

53.speaker: Shadow-Whiskers
53.text: I roar. Break my cage - and then you die. You all die.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Break the lock, ensuring the cage can't be opened.

61.speaker: Shadow-Whiskers
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Give a punch to the cage. Reuse.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: When exactly do you plan on killing everyone?

60.speaker: Player
60.text: Murder whoever you want. I'll be long gone.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: Tell me what you're up to or I set this cage on fire.

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *The beast ignores you, her eyes locked on the crowd.*
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: the beast is NOT looking at player, she's looking away in the direction of the crowd

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Make a noise, trying to catch her attention.

54.speaker: Narrator
54.text: *You see a tidal wave of hate and violence in her eyes, before she turns away.*
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Turns to look at player, then turns back to the crowd. Player claps hands or make a noise. Reusing animation.

66.speaker: Narrator
66.text: *She will attack, and kill, at the first opportunity.*

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Break the lock, trapping the beast within.

75.speaker: Narrator
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: Give a punch to the cage. Reuse.
